Title: Savage Orruks
Legend: Savage Orruks cross the battlefield as a howling tide of tattooed green flesh. As more of these frenzied greenskins mob together, the Waaagh! energy flowing through them grows stronger, until they become akin to a raging storm of primal destruction.
Intro: Each model in a Savage Orruks unit is armed with 1 of the following weapon options: Chompa; or Savage Stikka. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Brutal Rukk • Kunnin’ Rukk

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Savage Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Bone Totem Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Bone Totem Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Skull Thumper. You can add 1 to charge rolls for a unit that includes any Skull Thumpers.

Rules.Name: Primal Surge
Rules.Fluff: Savage Orruks ride the wave ofWaaagh! energy that courses through their veins as they crash into the enemy.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.
